room_title: Escape room "Edgar Allan Poe -The Oval Portrait" by Charm City Clue Room in Baltimore
room_description:
So great was her love for her new husband, and so powerful was his passion for his art, stoically she sat for weeks while he painted the very essence of her life into her portrait.

It wasnâ€™t until the last detail was complete that the artist realized he truly entrapped her spirit into his work.

While her body has since been laid to rest, her soul remains entrapped in the oval portrait. Can you find a way to release her?
